website_summaries.verdict: A clean, durable undermount sink that will add elegance to any bathroom.
pros: Deep rectangular sink that won't splash water on your counter
cons: May be too large for small vanities

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink, kohler quality
customer_reviews.text: First sink arrived shattered (bad packing) but a replacement sink arrived within 48 hours in perfect shape. This is a well made high quality Kohler porcelain sink with an overflow. It’s a Kohler so you know the porcelain will last 50 years or more. It is less than 15” front to back which allows us to install it in a shallow counter with faucet mounted on the wall, yet it’s plenty big for the task (22x14 1/4) and water doesn’t splash out if it. The clean design works with our 1939 house, but it would look good also in a contemporary bathroom. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: kmwyolo

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY IT HERE!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy a sink here! It came broken. They shipped it in a cardboard box without any protection. I had to repurchase the same sink from another distributor and they shipped the same sink very differently to prevent shipping damage. The sink itself is great. We have been remodeling our bathrooms, and I replaced all of the original sinks with these. Five stars for the sink. One Star for this seller. My advice is to buy from build.com.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Sopko Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in excellent condition but packing materials are questionable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 8 of these and all arrived in excellent condition and no problems. Very nice sink and happy with the price I paid. I noticed before ordering that there are many reviews indicating breakage as a problem so I made sure to inspect all of the items closely when they arrived. One interesting point was that all of the Kohler boxes had no packing materials inside of them whatsoever, the sink was just allowed to bounce around inside of the box. The Kohler box was then packed inside of a shipping box with packing materials to hold the inner box in place. Compliments to UPS for delivering these undamaged!
customer_reviews.author: Hammy

customer_reviews.title: As others posted. the sink in packed in a ...
customer_reviews.text: As others posted. the sink in packed in a box (no padding), which sits inside another box with a small piece of brown packing paper. I knew it was the sink before the UPS knocked on my door because I heard the broken cling-cling sound. He inspected and I refused to accept the box. Hopefully it's replacement arrives intact, I won't try three times as another buyer did.
customer_reviews.author: mycorrado

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a square sink and chose this one because the bottom is sloped instead of flat. I've used a friend's flat-bottom square sink and you end up having to wash out the soap and toothpaste, etc after each use. The Ladena doesn't have that problem. It looks great in a modern bathroom design. I got the smaller version for a powder room and the larger one for the master bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: MajorDudette

customer_reviews.title: Same sink, different color
customer_reviews.text: Great sink for reduced splashing. Had the first one for over 20 years. Replaced with the same model in white this time. Kohler is very dependable. Good products.
customer_reviews.author: Mary OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the sink is great - we love the size
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the sink is great - we love the size! The only thing about the sink is that it is not a true white. We installed a white quartz countertop and the sink looks beige. The other Kohler sink we bought for the smaller bath is very white. Don't understand why they call them both white when they look different with the counters.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Birch

customer_reviews.title: Inspect the product for damages and needed parts!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast but one sink has a large piece broken off one corner. My bad for waiting so long to open the box as I am beyond the warranty period. Since it is an undermount, we may be able to conceal the missing chunk. Lesson: open and inspect upon receipt. The second sink was not damaged but neither sink has a mounting template. Hopefully I can obtain one from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: It looks great!  Contemporary!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these sinks for a complete bathroom remodel. They were deep and wide and looks very contemporary/modern with the rectangle shape. Overall I was quite pleased with this sink. Please note that the sink drain closes by pushing the sink plug down with your fingers. It does not have the pull rod like other sinks you may be used to. I like this because it makes the faucets look clean and with less clutter. If you like the pull rod, then this sink may not be for you...or maybe you can McGyver it to adapt a pull rod into the sink. This sink is nice. Cheers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Love the shape.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shape. I bought two of these for my bathroom renovation. They are installed and look great, but since the bathroom is not yet finished, I cannot comment on their performance. I'm sure they'll be fine.l Love Kohler products.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of this basin
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this basin, though am having some trouble getting the drain to mount flush in the opening. I'm not super experienced with plumbing, so it may just be me and not the sink. It has a very high end look and is a great size for tighter spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Louise

customer_reviews.title: Great sink!
customer_reviews.text: Nice design. Perfect depth. Cleans beautifully. Nothing beats a Kohler sink, IMO, and I've tried many brands. I design kitchens and baths. I put two under a granite bathroom countertop and they look very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: SoundsGood2Me

customer_reviews.title: Ladena Sink
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink it is deep but the specs are misleading as I recall it didn't really give the dimension from the top of the sink to the drain and since it is under mount that also adds depth. I have it in a Cambria Torquay counter and I think it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: L Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect style for our remodel and 50% less than at the 'box stores'
customer_reviews.text: We remodeled our master bath and this was a perfect fit for our style. Best of all, on Amazon the price was about 50% less than the 'box stores', not to mention specialty plumbing boutiques.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looks!
customer_reviews.text: Got them installed today. They look beautiful. Can't wait to start using them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Goodnight

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink. I bought four of these for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink. I bought four of these for a current project and I have purchased many of these in the past. Don't buy the cheap imitation knockoffs - spring for these guys.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Lovely deep sink. The rectangular shape is refreshing. I thank my architect for this recommendation! Highly recommend. Only small complaint - dirt tends to accumulate around the drain ring and is a little difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Kohler!
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Kohler. The underneath was a bit larger than expected which cause me to have to cut out a piece of the vanity to make it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality Kohler product, Price isnt that cheap but nothing kohler is
customer_reviews.author: Jared Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Sink does not work with 18" wide cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Sink does not work with 18" wide cabinet. I had counter top template done today and it does not work. Amazon will not allow me to return the 2 sinks (you only get short amount of time to return) I bought so I am out of $500 so beware before buying cause I got hosed.
customer_reviews.author: Edward O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: awesome looking sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is gorgeous in my newly remodeled bathroom. Fits the style I was going for and for MUCH cheaper than buying locally.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: We needed a good sized sink for a narrow (depth) cabinet. This has worked out perfectly. Plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: MBA

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and functionality
customer_reviews.text: This was to replace one I broke. Looks like new again.
customer_reviews.author: PJM

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't believe how great they were
customer_reviews.text: I took a shot at ordering these on line...I couldn't believe how great they were...the packaging was so well done - no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sms

customer_reviews.title: Nice but showed up damaged
customer_reviews.text: The sink is nice but it showed up with a small fingernail size chip in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sink . . . lots of space to brush teeth and wash hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jeré Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sink
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink. Excellent stain and crud resistant finish. Great looking.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Meathook

customer_reviews.title: Great Sink
customer_reviews.text: Quality well-made sink. nice size and depth. After a couple years, it still looks great. I highly recommend this sink.
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sink! Looks good in our remodel. Kohler was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K. Olson

customer_reviews.title: The sinks are beautiful! However
customer_reviews.text: The sinks are beautiful! However, I have two sinks where the drain cut out was an oval after the drain was home up the sink leaked. Waiting on replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Ladena lavis impeccable!
customer_reviews.text: Returned two China made sinks that were flawed very noticeably. These were twice the price of the cheaper ones, however, the cheap ones would have irritated me every day. Sometimes you gotta pay up! LOL
customer_reviews.author: howard l weston

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I had a new marble top that I bought from Habitat for Humanity with a rectangular hole already cut out . This was the ONLY sink I could find that matched up with the pre cut hole. It worked perfectly for my situation. One problem was that the drain hole was out of round which caused it to leak but a larger fit-up rubber fixed the problem easily. Very happy with this item!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne F. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size and shape. I really like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: B. Sue Polen

customer_reviews.title: They look great and work well
customer_reviews.text: Received and installed without a hitch. They look great and work well. They are plenty deep to avoid sloshing over.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous contemporary sink
customer_reviews.text: We bought these sinks for our bathroom during a recent remodel and they go so well underneath our new granite countertops and. They are the perfect depth, great craftsmanship, and add a touch of modern elegance to our new bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy girl

customer_reviews.title: Great sink for the lav
customer_reviews.text: My contractor and I were looking for this sink for a bathroom remodel and could not find it locally. So early one Sunday morning I found it on Amazon and ordered it. It arrived Tuesday and was installed a few days later and I love it. I will get another one for the next bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: L. Blum

customer_reviews.title: Gives your bathroom a modern flare
customer_reviews.text: I put two of these sinks in my guest bath. They give the room a modern flare because they are simple, but artistic. The "wave" design is somewhat unusual so it catches the eye right away. Happily, they arrived the first try with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Doralou

customer_reviews.title: Great sink, but be sure your vanity has room ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sink, but be sure your vanity has room for the undermount. Ours didn't and we had to return one. The other is working flawlessly. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: D. Albrand

product_meta.title: KOHLER K-2214-0 Ladena Under-Mount Bathroom Sink, White
feature_bullets: DESIGN: Rectangular basin with curved bottom.
REQUIRES: No faucet holes; requires wall- or counter-mount faucet.
MATERIAL: Vitreous china for lasting beauty and exceptional durability.
INSTALLATION: Under-mount installation allows this sink to seamlessly integrate into your bath or powder room design.
NOTE: ADA-compliant when installed in a 24" minimum depth countertop.
